languages.text: "Во время варп-перелета вы отдали неверные распоряжения, из-за чего корабль сбился с курса и пострадал техотсек".

traits.locale_text: "Во время варп-перелета вы отдали неверные распоряжения, из-за чего корабль сбился с курса и пострадал техотсек".

languages.text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."
languages.original_text: "Во время варп-перелета вы отдали неверные распоряжения, из-за чего корабль сбился с курса и пострадал техотсек".

traits.locale_text: "During the Warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off-course and the mechanical bay being destroyed."
"During the Warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off-course and the mechanical bay being destroyed."
"During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."
"During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."
"During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

languages.text: “在亚空间航行的过程中，你下达了错误的命令，导致飞船偏离航线，服务区域被毁。”
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: “在亚空间航行的过程中，你下达了错误的命令，导致飞船偏离航线，服务区域被毁。”

languages.text: «Durante el viaje en la disformidad dio las órdenes equivocadas, lo que hizo que la nave se desviara y perdiéramos la bahía de servicio».
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: «Durante el viaje en la disformidad dio las órdenes equivocadas, lo que hizo que la nave se desviara y perdiéramos la bahía de servicio».

languages.text: 「ワープ航行中、カシア殿は間違った命令を下した。そのせいで、船はコースを外れ、サービスベイは破壊されたのだ」
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: 「ワープ航行中、カシア殿は間違った命令を下した。そのせいで、船はコースを外れ、サービスベイは破壊されたのだ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt während der Warp-Reise falsche Befehle erteilt, wodurch das Schiff vom Kurs abkam und die Wartungsbucht zerstört wurde."
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt während der Warp-Reise falsche Befehle erteilt, wodurch das Schiff vom Kurs abkam und die Wartungsbucht zerstört wurde."

languages.text: « Pendant le voyage Warp, à cause des ordres que vous avez donnés, le vaisseau a dévié de sa trajectoire et l'aire de service a été détruite. »
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant le voyage Warp, à cause des ordres que vous avez donnés, le vaisseau a dévié de sa trajectoire et l'aire de service a été détruite. »

languages.text: "Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında yanlış emirler vererek geminin rota dışına çıkmasına ve hizmet güvertesinin yok olmasına sebep oldun."
languages.original_text: "During the warp voyage you gave the wrong orders, which led to the vessel shifting off course and the service bay being destroyed."

traits.locale_text: "Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında yanlış emirler vererek geminin rota dışına çıkmasına ve hizmet güvertesinin yok olmasına sebep oldun."
